newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB-120 index rises eight points to 812.4 pt.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB-120 index rises eight points to 812.4 pt.

text.p: The CNB-120 index, a broad daily measure of Czech equities, rose eight points on Friday to 812.4, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said.
Eight of the ten sectoral indices gained, with the energy index rising the most, up 17.8 points to 969.
